TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: (H. M. Hall & Clements) G. L. Nesom & G. I. Baird

treatment.description: Plants 30–100 cm. Leaves crowded, green; blades 1–3-nerved, oblanceolate, 45–70 × 5–14 mm, faces glabrous or puberulent, gland-dotted; distalmost shorter than arrays. Heads 10+ in cymiform arrays. Involucres 12–14 mm. Phyllaries 11–15, chartaceous, apices erect or ± recurved, attenuate (mostly glabrous). Florets 5–7; corollas ca. 10 mm, tubes mostly glabrous, throats ± abruptly dilated, lobes about 2.5 mm.
